availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Warren County, Kentucky, farmer. North Carolina native. Married Mary Mannen. Father of Joseph W. Mannen and Erwin Mannen. Farmer in Warren County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Warren County in 1850 and 1860. Owned four enslaved people in Warren County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, Second District; Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, Second District; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, District No. 1, p. 103; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, District No. 1, p. 23.
